resources.string:
Enter your MyFIU credentials, then choose a trinket to later access your account.

 Follow the below steps:

 1. Choose a trinket
 2. Take 3 photos of the trinket from the same angle
 3. To login, take a photo of your trinket from the same angle
 4. Enter your MyFIU credentials 

Press next to start.

If you have recieved an error while taking a picture of trinket please make sure: 

1.You are taking the image of the same trinket 

2.The trinket does not have a plain texture 

3.There is enough light

Please check out the following possible reasons and retry:

1. Insufficient lighting
2. The trinket has plain texture
3. The photos you took (see below) are not from the same object
